alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 27 at 8:57PM CDT until August 27 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota, including the following counties, in northeast Iowa, Allamakee and Winneshiek. In southeast Minnesota, Houston. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of thunderstorms will bring heavy rainfall to the area tonight. The potential exists for 3 to 4 inches of rain. This would cause urban flooding and possibly mudslides. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
